Title: Faculty and Staff Directory
Content: A searchable directory that provides contact information for faculty and staff members, including photos, areas of expertise, and office hours.

Title: Campus Safety and Security App
Content: An app that provides students with real-time alerts and updates on campus safety and security issues, including emergency notifications, crime reports, and weather alerts.

Title: Campus Facilities Management System
Content: A system that manages the maintenance and upkeep of campus buildings and facilities, including work order management, asset tracking, and preventative maintenance planning.
